descriptionNullable:
### About Data

Data represents customer sentiments regarding pizza hut food and other services.
Data was collected by web scraping: [Pizza Hut Food Reviews](https://www.consumeraffairs.com/food/pizza-hut.html)

###  Data Columns
- id
- customer review
- review submitted on date
- overall_ratings
- upvotes number (people who upvoted the review)

### Possible Applications
- Sentiment Analysis
- Can figure out the trend of reviews based on time
title: Pizza Hut Reviews
subtitle: pizza hut customer reviews
description:
### About Data

Data represents customer sentiments regarding pizza hut food and other services.
Data was collected by web scraping: [Pizza Hut Food Reviews](https://www.consumeraffairs.com/food/pizza-hut.html)

###  Data Columns
- id
- customer review
- review submitted on date
- overall_ratings
- upvotes number (people who upvoted the review)

### Possible Applications
- Sentiment Analysis
- Can figure out the trend of reviews based on time
